name: Exemption of Hawaii tourism authority from administrative supervision of boards and commissions
text: §201B-5  Exemption of Hawaii tourism authority from administrative supervision of boards and commissions.  Notwithstanding any law to the contrary, the authority shall be exempt from section 26-35 with the exception of section 26-35(a)(2), (3), (7), (8) and subsection (b). [L 1998, c 156, pt of §2; am L 2004, c 16, §2; am L 2005, c 22, §4]
